(Just so everybody knows this is my first time rping a female character)

:=
:Battera/Dachande::

    They both started out to Vulois' posisition, Batte=
ra in Beast Mode, flying high and Dachande in Robot Mode running through th=
e forest like he owned it.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dachande=
 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, December 02, 2000 8:13 AM
  S=
ubject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  ::Dachande::

      He recived Vulois' messa=
ge. Then he turned to Battera, "Yes, we'll go."
    ----- Original Message =
----- 
    From: Alloran2@... 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Fr=
iday, December 01, 2000 8:16 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    OOC: =
Sorry to see you leaving Minime and Dcoburn you will be missed.  Thanks 
  =
  for Wheeljack! 

    :::Vulois/Starscream/Wheeljack::: 

    ::Vulois ope=
ned his comm to Battera and Cybershark:: 
    Vulois: Battera, Cybershark, =
this is Vulois.  I have a proposition for the 
    two of you.  Would you p=
lease come to my position? 
    -------------------------------------------=
-----------------------------------

    ----------------------------------=
----------- 
    ::Starscream hears gunfire and rushes to the source and se=
es the battle 
    between Quickstrike:: 
    Starscream: WHAT THE SLAG?  W=
hat happened? 
    --------------------------------------------------------=
----------------------

    --------------------------------------------- 
=
    ::Wheeljack walked to Zardus' position:: 
    Wheeljack: Zardus, do you=
 have any orders? 

          eGroups Sponsor
